meta.title: Vocal Lessons in Limassol • Inna Gurina • Vocal Coach
meta.description: Welcome to Vocal Lessons in Limassol. I am Inna, a professional vocal coach offering personalized lessons in Limassol.
meta.keywords: Vocal Lessons in Limassol, Vocal Coach in Limassol, Limassol Vocal Teacher

header.title: Vocal Lessons in Limassol
header.intro: Hello! I’m Inna Gurina, a professional vocal coach offering personalized lessons for all ages and skill levels in Limassol.

about.missionText1: In addition to teaching, I am a professional singer with years of experience in live performances. I am happy to share the knowledge and techniques I’ve gained with my students every day.
about.missionText2: I have experience in performing, writing, and teaching in various genres, though I specialize in pop, soul, and RnB.

location.title: Location
location.address: The studio is located at 4a Douriou Ippou St., Limassol

teachingSpace.title: Teaching Space
teachingSpace.description: I conduct most of my lessons in a specially equipped studio. I also offer lessons via Skype and Zoom.

cta.getInTouch: Get in touch to book your first lesson
